TITLE: Mark Cuban became a millionaire at age 32—here's why he chose against retiring early
SUMMARY: At age 25, Mark Cuban wanted to get rich and retire within a decade. He achieved the first part — but here's why he's still working, nearly 40 years later.

TITLE: Young, wealthy investors are flocking to alternative investments, study shows. What to know before adding to your portfolio
SUMMARY: Many younger, wealthy investors are looking beyond the stock market for above-average returns, with 80% turning to alternative investments.

TITLE: Powerball's jackpot is now $420 million and Mega Millions' top prize is $494 million. Here's how to handle a huge windfall
SUMMARY: If you beat the odds stacked against hitting the jackpot, there are some key things to do — and not do — right out of the gate.

TITLE: 39-year-old millionaire shares why he 'regrets' paying off his 2 home mortgages: 'I felt trapped'
SUMMARY: Graham Cochrane was living off food stamps before he built a million-dollar business. He paid off two mortgages and was debt-free by age 35. But just a year later, he regretted his decision. Here's what he would have done differently—and his advice for homebuyers.

TITLE: Free weekly credit reports are available through the end of 2023. Why you may want to check yours now
SUMMARY: Free weekly credit reports are now available from the three major credit bureaus through the end of 2023. Here's how that can help boost your credit score.

TITLE: Mark Cuban credits his first tech job to this interview strategy: I answered a trick question honestly
SUMMARY: Dallas Mavericks owner Mark Cuban says he landed his first job in tech by answering a trick question honestly. The foot in the door led to a lucrative career.

TITLE: These are common (and costly) Roth IRA conversion mistakes. Here's how to avoid them
SUMMARY: While Roth individual retirement account conversions may be alluring when the stock market dips, it's easy to make mistakes, financial experts say.

TITLE: Jamie Dimon says Musk should 'clean up Twitter,' echoes Tesla CEO's bot concerns
SUMMARY: Jamie Dimon appears to be a fan of Elon Musk's $44 billion Twitter takeover deal.

TITLE: Airlines are adding more flights in Asia. Here's how that may affect airfares
SUMMARY: Recent announcements from major airlines show that commercial aviation continues to rebound in the region. But it may take some time before airfares fall.

TITLE: Here's how uber-rich pass wealth to heirs tax-free when markets are down
SUMMARY: Wealthy people like Michael Bloomberg and Mark Zuckerberg have used grantor-retained annuity trusts. The trusts have better odds of success in down markets.

TITLE: IRS delays guidelines, waiving penalties for some inherited retirement accounts until 2023
SUMMARY: If you inherited a retirement account in 2020 or 2021, the IRS is waiving penalties for some heirs who needed to start taking required minimum distributions.

TITLE: Shaquille O’Neal reveals Jeff Bezos's investing principle that he still uses today
SUMMARY: Former NBA basketball player Shaquille O'Neal shared an investment principle he heard from Amazon founder Jeff Bezos, which has inspired his undertakings since.

TITLE: I spent 5 years interviewing 233 millionaires—here are the 6 habits that made them ultra wealthy
SUMMARY: What separates the ultra rich and successful from everyone else? Financial expert Tom Corley spent five years interviewing 233 millionaires to find out the habits they had in common.

TITLE: Here's how to pay 0% capital gains taxes with a six-figure income
SUMMARY: You may qualify for the 0% long-term capital gains rate with a six-figure income. Here's how to calculate your taxable income to harvest tax-free gains.

TITLE: Kevin O'Leary says he's betting on Elon Musk amid Twitter drama: ‘I think this guy is Teflon’
SUMMARY: "Shark Tank" investor Kevin O'Leary says he thinks Elon Musk's Twitter deal will go through, and that it'll benefit both the platform and Musk's other companies.

TITLE: These are the 10 states where renters are most behind on payments — and high-cost California didn't make the list
SUMMARY: Some 15% of American households, around 6 million, are behind on rent this fall, according to a new report. Here's where renters are struggling the most.

TITLE: Mega Millions jackpot is $410 million. Here are 3 key things to do if you win
SUMMARY: Given the size of the windfall, there are a few important things to do if you discover you're holding the winning ticket, experts say.

TITLE: Afraid of heights, he climbed Mount Everest — now he's helping others conquer their fears too
SUMMARY: Vivian James Rigney tells CNBC Travel about what he learned — and how much it cost him — to climb the tallest mountains on every continent.

TITLE: A $150 million beach home for sale would be the Hamptons' priciest ever — if it can find a buyer
SUMMARY: The compound, called La Dune, draws from a tiny pool of buyers, likely billionaires, and has been on and off the market since 2016.

TITLE: Key Democrat outlines 5 priorities for $80 billion in IRS funding
SUMMARY: Senate Finance Committee Chairman Ron Wyden, D-Ore., has outlined five priorities for nearly $80 billion in new IRS funding. Here's a breakdown of each one.

TITLE: Billionaire Melinda French Gates wants to create an alternative to Silicon Valley: 'To change it would be incredibly hard'
SUMMARY: Melinda French Gates says there aren't enough women in tech. Her solution: Create a new model for tech startups instead of trying to fix Silicon Valley.

TITLE: The tax extension deadline is Oct. 17. Watch out for these 3 common errors, advisors warn
SUMMARY: If you're racing to meet the Oct. 17 tax extension deadline, don't skip these easy-to-miss forms. Here are three common mistakes, according to the experts.

TITLE: The price of butter is sky-high and 'not going to come down,' says supply chain expert—here's why
SUMMARY: In January, the average price of butter was $3.67 per pound. In September, it was $4.70 per pound.

TITLE: Self-made millionaire who retired early: 'Do these 5 things now or you'll regret it later in life'
SUMMARY: Self-made millionaire Steve Adcock retired early at 35 years old, and now lives a "happy, frugal" life in Arizona. While it might look like he did everything right, he says he had to learn some lessons the hard way. Here's what he regrets not doing sooner in life.

TITLE: The idea of Jeff Bezos 'scared' me away from trying to buy the Phoenix Suns, says Shaquille O'Neal
SUMMARY: Shaquille O'Neal says he doesn't want to compete with Jeff Bezos' massive net worth over the Phoenix Suns: "Nobody on this planet can compete with Big Man JB."

TITLE: TreasuryDirect sold more than $27 billion in Series I bonds since Nov. 1. Now it’s getting a makeover
SUMMARY: The U.S. Department of the Treasury has unveiled a makeover for TreasuryDirect, the platform used to buy Series I bonds. Here's what investors need to know.

TITLE: Here's how we determine the FA 100 ranking for 2022
SUMMARY: The methodology for the 2022 CNBC FA 100 ranking of registered investment advisors was prepared in partnership with data provider AccuPoint Solutions.

TITLE: The CNBC FA 100 ranking recognizes advisory firms that help clients navigate their financial lives
SUMMARY: The CNBC FA 100 recognizes advisory firms that help clients navigate their financial lives. This annual ranking may help you find an advisor to work with.

TITLE: FA 100: CNBC ranks the top-rated financial advisory firms of 2022
SUMMARY: For the fourth year, CNBC unveils its ranking of top financial advisors. The CNBC FA 100 recognizes firms that best help clients navigate their financial lives.

TITLE: Manhattan apartment sales declined 18% in third quarter, as rates rose and markets fell
SUMMARY: Manhattan apartment sales fell 18% in the third quarter, as rising mortgage rates and declining stock markets put the brakes on New York's real estate comeback.
